actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mixturesof cobaltate(3-), bis[2-[[[4-(hydroxy-kO)-3-[2-[2-(oxo-kO)-1-[(pheylamino) carbonyl] propyl] diazenyl-kN1] phenyl] sulfonyl] amino] benzoato(3-)]-, ammonium sodium and coaltate(2-), [2-[[[4-(hydroxy-kO)-3- [2-[2-(oxo-kO)-1-[(phenylamino) carbonyl] propyl] diazenyl-kN1] phenyl] sulfonyl] amino] benzoato (3-)][2-[2-[2-(hydroxy-kO)-5-[(phenylamino) sulfony] phenyl] diazenyl-kN1]-3- (oxokO)-N-phenylbutanamidato (2-)]-, ammonium sodium.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on mixturesof cobaltate(3-), bis[2-[[[4-(hydroxy-kO)-3-[2-[2-(oxo-kO)-1-[(pheylamino) carbonyl] propyl] diazenyl-kN1] phenyl] sulfonyl] amino] benzoato(3-)]-, ammonium sodium and coaltate(2-), [2-[[[4-(hydroxy-kO)-3- [2-[2-(oxo-kO)-1-[(phenylamino) carbonyl] propyl] diazenyl-kN1] phenyl] sulfonyl] amino] benzoato (3-)][2-[2-[2-(hydroxy-kO)-5-[(phenylamino) sulfony] phenyl] diazenyl-kN1]-3- (oxokO)-N-phenylbutanamidato (2-)]-, ammonium sodium.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on mixturesof cobaltate(3-), bis[2-[[[4-(hydroxy-kO)-3-[2-[2-(oxo-kO)-1-[(pheylamino) carbonyl] propyl] diazenyl-kN1] phenyl] sulfonyl] amino] benzoato(3-)]-, ammonium sodium and coaltate(2-), [2-[[[4-(hydroxy-kO)-3- [2-[2-(oxo-kO)-1-[(phenylamino) carbonyl] propyl] diazenyl-kN1] phenyl] sulfonyl] amino] benzoato (3-)][2-[2-[2-(hydroxy-kO)-5-[(phenylamino) sulfony] phenyl] diazenyl-kN1]-3- (oxokO)-N-phenylbutanamidato (2-)]-, ammonium sodium.
